fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, stack a player. Roll a 1d6. They die on a 1-6. 1 use, regain a use every time you roll a 4+.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- RB and control 1/6 immune (when RBED or Controlled, roll a 1d6. On 6 you are immune)
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction.**__
